title: Build fails on 16.04
body_html:
Once again, I have the issue that the current master (a853a74) doesn't build for me. The error is

…
[ 87%] Linking CXX shared library ../lib/libcaffe2_gpu.so

Scanning dependencies of target test_parallel

What could the problem be?
